result.arabic_text: وَقَضَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰ بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لَتُفۡسِدُنَّ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مَرَّتَيۡنِ وَلَتَعۡلُنَّ عُلُوّٗا كَبِيرٗا
result.translation: 4. israa-iil xayloh tawraat kitaabih addal baaxô (beytal maqhdis baaxo kinnuk) bagul umaane nammadda abettoonuuh kaxxa caddok taturuh taturettoonu iyyaanam keenil mekelleeh keenih warisne.
